about_the_game:
Dara is a famous horror streamer in Southeast Asia. Every day, hundreds, even thousands of eyes wait for her to return to the screen, bringing new stories that send shivers down the spine. In her new home, which has become a haven for creativity, Dara feels at ease. A warm cup of coffee, the soft clicks of a mouse on the desk, and the view outside her window that constantly sparks inspiration have become integral parts of her life. There is something captivating about the quiet of the night and the mystical world she explores on her computer, as if fear itself has become her closest companion.

But as time goes by, that comfort starts to shift. An unusual fatigue creeps through her body, as if something unseen is slowly draining her energy. Even though she continues to smile in front of the camera, delivering captivating horror tales, behind the screen, her body often feels heavy. There are moments when she senses she’s being watched—not by her audience, but by something beyond sight. Every time she glances back, there’s only emptiness behind her.

Comment after comment from her fans starts to appear, voicing the same concerns. Something isn’t right. The unease she had long ignored now becomes impossible to dismiss. She knows the time has come to step out of the comfort of her virtual world. The IRL (In Real Life) stream she plans becomes her way to search for answers—answers to what she’s been feeling but unable to explain. Perhaps, out there, something is waiting to be found. Something more terrifying than just an ordinary horror story.

Khodam: The Contract is a True FPS Psychological Horror game that immerses players in the world of Dara, a horror streamer in Southeast Asia. Experience enhanced graphics and refined mechanics as you navigate a terrifying landscape filled with supernatural threats.

Stream in real-time using a smartphone and selfie stick, engaging with viewers while unraveling chilling mysteries. Make choices that impact the story, explore diverse locations, and encounter entities from Indonesian folklore.

  • Build Dara’s characteristics to suit your playstyle.

  • Discover clues about what’s really happening.

  • Explore within both PC and mobile environments for information and hints.

  • Form friendships or rivalries with NPCs based on your interactions.

  • Engage with an interactive environment that mimics the real world, allowing you to pay bills and order items as you would in real life.

content_descriptors.notes: Creepy atmospheric visualization, Psychological Impact, Phasmophobia and Nyctophobia should be monitored

detailed_description:
Dara is a famous horror streamer in Southeast Asia. Every day, hundreds, even thousands of eyes wait for her to return to the screen, bringing new stories that send shivers down the spine. In her new home, which has become a haven for creativity, Dara feels at ease. A warm cup of coffee, the soft clicks of a mouse on the desk, and the view outside her window that constantly sparks inspiration have become integral parts of her life. There is something captivating about the quiet of the night and the mystical world she explores on her computer, as if fear itself has become her closest companion.

But as time goes by, that comfort starts to shift. An unusual fatigue creeps through her body, as if something unseen is slowly draining her energy. Even though she continues to smile in front of the camera, delivering captivating horror tales, behind the screen, her body often feels heavy. There are moments when she senses she’s being watched—not by her audience, but by something beyond sight. Every time she glances back, there’s only emptiness behind her.

Comment after comment from her fans starts to appear, voicing the same concerns. Something isn’t right. The unease she had long ignored now becomes impossible to dismiss. She knows the time has come to step out of the comfort of her virtual world. The IRL (In Real Life) stream she plans becomes her way to search for answers—answers to what she’s been feeling but unable to explain. Perhaps, out there, something is waiting to be found. Something more terrifying than just an ordinary horror story.

name: Khodam: The Contract

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 (Zen) / Intel Core i5-6400 (Skylake) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 16 Series with 4GB VRAM or Radeon RX 580 with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Playing on minimum requirements should enable you to play at Low/Medium settings in Full HD (1080p) with a stable 30 FPS. SSD is recommended for faster load times and smoother gameplay. Make sure your FPS stays above 15 to prevent bugs.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600 (Zen+) / Intel Core i7-6700K (Skylake) or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce RTX 20 series with 6 GB VRAM / Radeon RX 6600 XT with 8 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: For optimal performance, set graphics to High or Cinematic in Full HD (1080p) or higher, ensuring a stable FPS of up to 60. A fast SSD is highly recommended for seamless gameplay. Your GPU should meet or exceed recommended specs, and turn on Ray Tracing for the most immersive experience.

short_description: A True First-Person Psychological Horror game inspired by Indonesian folklore about the protective unseen spirit, 'Khodam.' Play as Dara, a famous Southeast Asian horror streamer, as she unravels strange anomalies and seeks to uncover her true identity.
